description:
It’s been officially announced that a new Disney Plus series has been canceled after airing only one season on their streaming platform. The series, which premiered on the service earlier this year, received a positive reception at the time of its release. As such, it may be a surprise to know that it’s been canceled [...]

The post Disney Plus Cancels Series After One Season appeared first on ScreenGeek.
title: Disney Plus Cancels Series After One Season
